meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Drink</kanji>ing <kanji>as much as you want</kanji> is nice and all, but don't get sick. When you see this word, you know you're at an <vocabulary>all you can drink</vocabulary> place. Tip: Usually there's a time limit, so drink up!
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from the word 放題 (ほうだい) and 飲む (のむ). So long as you know those vocab words, you'll be able to read this one as well.
